title: OPINION: Panicking Trump tries to change the subject
description: The deadly pandemic is surging in the United States. Efforts to stop the spread have largely failed, with more Americans than ever becoming infected every day. In the face of the growing calamity, the leader of the country announced via Twitter he has taken decisive action -- to protect statues. President Donald Trump tweeted late Friday afternoon that he signed a "very strong" executive order protecting monuments and statues, with "Long prison terms for these lawless acts against our Great Country!"

title: National Women's Soccer League players knelt during the national anthem wearing Black Lives Matter shirts
description: The National Women's Soccer League (NWSL) kicked off its season Saturday, making it the first major sports league to begin since the coronavirus pandemic halted the season.

title: Graham Linehan, creator of 'The IT Crowd' and 'Father Ted,' removed from Twitter
description: Graham Linehan, known for creating "The IT Crowd" and co-creating "Father Ted," has been permanently suspended from Twitter after allegedly making multiple transphobic comments.

title: New Delhi on high alert after locusts swarm
description: A swarm of desert locusts clouded the skies in the Indian city of Gurgaon on Saturday, prompting the government of the Indian capital New Delhi to issue an advisory informing officials to remain on high alert.

title: Swarms of locusts put Indian capital on high alert
description: A swarm of desert locusts descended on the Indian city of Gurgaon on Saturday, prompting the government of the Indian capital New Delhi to issue an advisory informing officials to remain on high alert.

title: Doctor on Covid-19 task force briefings: 'Stop screwing around'
description: Dr. Peter Hotez tells CNN's Victor Blackwell that the White House coronavirus task force needs to improve their briefings or risk losing the confidence of the general public.

title: This is Latin America's first primarily transgender school
description: At the Amaranta School in Santiago, Chile, most of the students are transgender. It's a welcoming place of learning for kids who were bullied or discriminated against at their previous schools.

title: Dolphins learn this fish-catching trick from their peers
description: Dolphins in Australia have been spotted trapping fish in huge conch shells. Scientists have now discovered just how they learn to catch their prey in this extraordinary way.

title: Dollar General's business is booming. It's also vulnerable to crime, police say
description: Dollar General is one of the fastest growing discount chains in the country. But its ultra low-cost business model could make it vulnerable to crime.

title: Meat packing facility reports over 200 cases of coronavirus
description: Three meat packing facilities have found themselves in coronavirus hotspots as Covid-19 continues to spread. CNN's Anna Stewart reports.

title: Never before has the science around Covid-19 been so opaque
description: A little more than three months after the World Health Organization officially declared the coronavirus outbreak a global pandemic, it has become evident that both the research cycle and the news cycle have accelerated to levels never seen before in our lifetime.

title: 5 states report highest number of coronavirus cases in one day
description: At least five states reported their highest single day record of Covid-19 cases Friday, adding to the growing concern of case increases that has sent many states back-peddling on their reopening plans.

title: Travel relief for Britons as two-week quarantine reviewed
description: The British government says it will announce travel agreements with countries such as France, Greece and Spain next week as it reviews its policy of imposing a 14-day quarantine for travelers arriving in Britain.

title: 'The Simpsons' to stop using white actors to voice non-white characters
description: "The Simpsons" will no longer use white actors to voice non-white characters, according to the show's producers.

title: California woman coughed on a baby in social distancing dispute, police say
description: Police are investigating video of an alleged assault that occurred at a Yogurtland in California where a woman is seen coughing in the face of a baby, allegedly because the mother was not maintaining proper social distance.

title: Three people died and one is permanently blind after drinking hand sanitizer in New Mexico
description: Three people died and one is permanently blind from methanol poisoning after drinking hand sanitizer in New Mexico, health officials said.

title: China opened an embassy on a remote island during the pandemic. Here's why
description: On a blue-sky day in May, as the coronavirus raged across the world, the Chinese flag was raised on a remote nation with a total population of 116,000, thousands of miles from Beijing.

title: 'Why are they able to do this?' Novak Djokovic's tennis tour ends in disaster
description: Novak Djokovic should have been stepping out this Monday at Wimbledon, opening the Championships as the defending champion.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury says portrayal of Jesus as White should be reconsidered
Why the EU is so White
Is the world turning its back on US tourists?
description:
Are vacations safe now? Here's what the experts say
12 states are pausing reopening over the surge in US coronavirus cases
An antibody treatment could be closer than a vaccine

title: As Liverpool party, 30 years ago the world was a very different place
description: If you were to compare the world in Liverpool's two most recent English title wins, in 1990 and 2020, it is almost unrecognizable.

title: Wirecard's collapse reveals cracks at heart of Germany, Inc
description: It's been a spectacularly bad week for German business.

title: Officers involved in death of Elijah McClain reassigned for their safety
description: Three Colorado police officers involved in a confrontation that left a Black man dead last year have been reassigned to "nonenforcement" duties, authorities said.

title: The three women who should be at the top of Biden's VP list
description: The selection of a running mate is among the biggest decisions a presidential candidate will make during their candidacy. The decision is particularly weighty when one realizes that one in five US presidents have not completed their full terms.

title: Measures to protect Trump from coronavirus scale up
A biracial woman was set on fire. The FBI is investigating it as a hate crime
National Women's Soccer League is the first professional league to resume
description: The National Women's Soccer League (NWSL) is returning to action this weekend after the start of its season was delayed due to the pandemic.

title: There were good news this week, too. Here are our favorites
description: Want more inspiring, positive news? Sign up for The Good Stuff, a newsletter for the good in life. It will brighten your inbox every Saturday morning.

title: Facebook takes down videos targeting California public health officers
description: Facebook has removed at least four videos posted by a group accused of targeting California public health officers over their directives to stay home and wear face masks to prevent spread of the coronavirus.

title: The President, concerned with how it would look if he got sick, insists on stronger protections even as he seeks to move past the pandemic
description:
• Coronavirus pandemic: Live updates from around the world
• As pandemic situation worsens, Pence paints a deceptively rosy picture
• US reports highest number of new coronavirus cases in a single day ... again
• See Gupta's response to Pence's virus claim
• Covid-19 antibody treatments could be close

title: NJ corrections officer may lose his job over George Floyd death re-enactment
description: A New Jersey corrections officer who was suspended for his alleged role in mocking the death of George Floyd and re-enacting it earlier this month faces termination from his job and internal charges from his union.

title: Paralympian Angela Madsen dies trying to row from California to Hawaii
description: Three-time Paralympian Angela Madsen died earlier this week while attempting a solo row from Los Angeles to Honolulu.

title: A man wins a $4 million lottery jackpot — for the second time
description: When most can't manage to get a $20 return on a scratch off,  one Michigan man walked away with $4 million ... TWICE!!

title: Trump was asked about a second term. Hear his response
description: During a Fox News town hall, President Trump gave a non-answer when asked about his priorities for a possible second term.

title: As pandemic worsens, Pence paints a deceptively rosy picture
description: The US had just hit a single-day record for new coronavirus cases. More than half the states were seeing increases in the rate of new cases. Multiple states were dealing with record numbers of coronavirus hospitalizations. Texas had announced hours earlier that it had to shut down in-person service at its bars again.
